keyword: how many calories are in cinnamon rolls
title: How Many Calories Are in Cinnamon Rolls?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in cinnamon rolls, including carbs, sugars, fat, and protein per roll, plus variations and FAQs for better understanding.
h1: How Many Calories Are in Cinnamon Rolls?
assumptions: Standard medium cinnamon roll (~70g) with cream cheese icing, baked; values based on typical store-bought or homemade recipe.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, brand, recipe, icing amount, and preparation method. Check labels for exact values when available.

quick_answer.text: One medium cinnamon roll with icing contains about 250 calories, primarily from carbs and sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison with product labels.

faqs.q: How many calories are in one cinnamon roll?
faqs.a: About 250 calories for a medium roll with icing.

faqs.q: Are cinnamon rolls high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, typically 20g of sugars per roll from the filling and icing.

faqs.q: How much fat is in cinnamon rolls?
faqs.a: Around 9g total fat per medium roll, including 4g saturated fat.
A modest 4g per roll, mainly from the dough.

faqs.q: How do calories vary in cinnamon rolls?
faqs.a: Smaller rolls are ~150-200 kcal; larger or extra-iced can exceed 400 kcal.
